MemAddress  Encoding	Lines_Code

0000000000	0x00000003	stl 0       
0000000001	0xFFFFFF0A	adj -1      
0000000002	0x00040000	loop:   ldc num
0000000003	0x00000004	ldnl 0      
0000000004	0x00040100	ldc sum
0000000005	0x00000004	ldnl 0      
0000000006	0x00000006	add         
0000000007	0x00040100	ldc sum
0000000008	0x00000005	stnl 0      
0000000009	0x00040000	ldc num
0000000010	0x00000004	ldnl 0      
0000000011	0xFFFFFF01	adc -1      
0000000012	0x0000030F	brz mean   
0000000013	0x00040000	ldc num
0000000014	0x00000005	stnl 0      
0000000015	0xFFFFF211	br loop     
0000000016	0x00040100	mean:     ldc sum
0000000017	0x00000004	ldnl 0      
0000000018	0x00040300	ldc num2
0000000019	0x00000004	ldnl 0      
0000000020	0x00000007	sub         
0000000021	0x00000810	brlz done
0000000022	0x00040100	ldc sum
0000000023	0x00000005	stnl 0      
0000000024	0x00040200	ldc meanl
0000000025	0x00000004	ldnl 0      
0000000026	0x00000101	adc +1      
0000000027	0x00040200	ldc meanl
0000000028	0x00000005	stnl 0       
0000000029	0xFFFFF211	br mean
0000000030	0x0000010A	done: adj 1       
0000000031	0x00000012	HALT 
0000001024	0x0000000B	num: data 11       
0000001025	0x00000000	sum: data 0         
0000001026	0x00000000	meanl: data 0
